thread.section_title: LilySilk Bedding Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LilySilk Bedding Store | lilysilk.com
thread.title: Sarah Falub
thread.title_full: LilySilk Bedding Store reviewed by Sarah Falub

author: Sarah Falub
title: Sarah Falub
text: This detergent is amazing! After one use my silk duvet was softer and silkier than ever. The first time I washed my duvet I used baby shampoo. And I felt like I messed up the texture. But nope! Using this returned it back to its original state. Maybe even better.
